name: Obama
description:
Obama is an action-adventure game where the player is tasked with ridding an unknown alien planet of the beasts that now inhabit it. But who is in command and what is their ultimate goal?

Bravely face off with powerful enemies.


Meet the quirky inhabitants of Dolus.


Explore an alien world.


Key Features:
  • Play cooperatively with a friend
  • 4 bosses to defeat in 3d bullet-hell inspired combat
  • Traverse the world and solve difficult platforming puzzles with your trusty grappling hook

Disclaimer: Any resemblance to actual events or locales or persons or American presidents, living or dead, is entirely coincidental.
